channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 观看：ChatGPT制造商OpenAI驳斥了埃隆-马斯克的说法，即这家初创公司放弃了开发人工智能的初衷，即造福人类而非牟利。
item.description:
WATCH: ChatGPT maker OpenAI refuted Elon Musk's claims that the startup abandoned its original mission to develop artificial intelligence for the benefit of humanity and not for profit https://t.co/twJNumlHEu pic.twitter.com/u6m5HNbZzV

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，摩根士丹利在市场溃败之际裁减 9% 的中国基金部门员工
item.description:
Morgan Stanley cuts 9% of China fund unit staff amid market rout, sources say https://t.co/pBj5jASlks pic.twitter.com/BqjVQvNpqh

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 法律与通用公司利润持平，无回购计划，股价下跌
item.description:
Legal & General posts flat profit, no buyback; shares dip https://t.co/HK4lETAIQY pic.twitter.com/3v8VYm8CWW

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 来自@Breakingviews：@mak_robyn 谈泰国要摆脱经济萎靡不振的局面，不能仅仅依靠泰勒-斯威夫特的演唱会来提振经济。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: @mak_robyn talks about why it will take more for Thailand to shake off its economic malaise than just banking on Taylor Swift’s concerts to boost its economy pic.twitter.com/t0FfuqgIbd

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: ACEA 旨在通过 76 亿美元投资成为基础设施集团
item.description:
ACEA aims to become infrastructure group with 7.6 bln investment https://t.co/zMnLBiJsvv pic.twitter.com/q2PqryJHcm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 观看：德国物流巨头DHL集团周三预测，其2024年的营业利润将高于疫情前的数字，但由于全球贸易疲软，该公司的前景没有达到市场共识。
item.description:
WATCH: German logistics giant DHL Group on Wednesday forecast its 2024 operating profit to come in above pre-pandemic figures, but the outlook fell short of market consensus amid weaker global trade https://t.co/rzfbAhh2VO pic.twitter.com/d7ESL9G4OV

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 瑞银集团老板斥责欧洲让美国引领银行业发展

UBS boss chastises Europe over letting U.S. take lead in banking https://t.co/6Yq5DdD30N pic.twitter.com/qk0C87oniu

item.title: 观看：塔吉特公布的假日季度财报显示，销售额降幅小于预期，全年可比销售额将大幅高于华尔街预期，股价因此上涨 12
item.description:
WATCH: Target reported higher holiday-quarter earnings on a smaller-than-expected sales decline and predicted that annual comparable sales would come in largely above Wall Street expectations, sending its shares up 12% https://t.co/fDUVVrjPMU pic.twitter.com/Tk39szciiJ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 看在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）上周对其联合创办的初创公司提起诉讼，指控该公司违约后，聊天软件制造商 OpenAI 表示打算驳回埃隆-马斯克的所有诉讼请求，并称这家由微软支持的公司现在正专注于赚钱。
item.description:
WATCH: ChatGPT maker OpenAI said it intends to move to dismiss all of Elon Musk's claims after he filed a lawsuit against the startup he co-founded last week, alleging breach of contract, saying the Microsoft-backed firm is now focused on making money https://t.co/twJNummfu2 pic.twitter.com/i49KrrjHeo

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 三位知情人士透露，私募股权公司凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group）已开始出售日本化妆品供应商 Tokiwa，交易价值可能达到 8 亿美元。
item.description:
Private equity firm Carlyle Group has begun the sale process of Japanese cosmetics supplier Tokiwa in a deal that could value the company at $800 million, three sources with knowledge of the matter said https://t.co/GCCHEUKyU7

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称日本央行将下调消费和产出评估
item.description:
BOJ seen revising down assessment on consumption and output, sources say https://t.co/cpeUaF3ocR pic.twitter.com/hFQusPtod5

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 斯里兰卡总统拉尼尔-维克拉马辛哈（Ranil Wickremesinghe）表示，斯里兰卡致力于在 2027-2042 年的时间表内偿还债务，并补充说，成功的债务重组谈判将使每年的外债偿还额降至国内生产总值的 4%。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Sri Lanka is committed to repaying its debt within the 2027-2042 schedule, President Ranil Wickremesinghe said, adding that successful debt restructuring negotiations will bring annual external debt payments down to 4% of GDP. More here: https://t.co/EiA72NZgN9

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，摩根士丹利在市场溃败之际裁减 9% 的中国基金部门员工

Morgan Stanley cuts 9% of China fund unit staff amid market rout, sources say https://t.co/aTytr2tjHj pic.twitter.com/eCnkpc9YAy

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：泰国对新加坡独家承办歌手泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）世界巡回演唱会东南亚唯一一站的协议表示不满。但 @mak_robyn 说，依靠这位明星来实现经济复苏似乎有些牵强。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Thailand has decried Singapore’s exclusive deal to host singer Taylor Swift’s only Southeast Asian stop on her world tour. But banking on the star for an economic recovery seems a stretch, says @mak_robyn pic.twitter.com/BPdtAP6RVG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 英国 Quilter 公司警告称，在监管审查中可能会产生 "补救成本
item.description:
UK's Quilter warns of potential 'remedial costs' amid regulatory scrutiny https://t.co/qqVZWL6474 pic.twitter.com/Dt2NxkgrnE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 一份关于跨国公司活动对环境影响的报告称，尼日利亚需要确保壳牌公司在撤离尼日尔三角洲之前安全地拆除其旧的基础设施，或付费将其从尼日尔三角洲移走。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Nigeria needs to ensure that Shell safely dismantles its old infrastructure or pays to remove them from the Niger delta before its exit, says a report on the environmental impact of the activities of multinational companies. More here: https://t.co/XmCExCy81A

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 法律与通用保险公司营业利润同比持平
item.description:
Insurer Legal & General posts flat operating profit year-on-year https://t.co/pP45aMSuab pic.twitter.com/L0lk5AlQ4M

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 中国年轻饮酒者对威士忌和白兰地的需求日益增长，全球饮料巨头都在努力开发这一市场，但它们在与中国主要白酒生产商的竞争中面临挑战。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Global drinks giants seeking to tap into younger Chinese drinkers' growing appetite for whiskies and cognacs face a challenge as they take on the producers of China's dominant liquor baijiu. More here: https://t.co/9Z9VczHv1R

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 随着从股票、加密货币到住房的资产价值不断攀升，通货膨胀率仍被认为过高，美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）将向美国国会议员介绍经济的最新情况，以及在政治气氛浓厚的大选年降息的前景。
item.description:
With asset values from stocks to crypto to homes piling higher and inflation still considered too high, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell will update US lawmakers on the economy and prospects for interest rate cuts in a politically charged election year https://t.co/5QQTAncTvC

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 全球贸易不温不火，DHL 集团 2024 年预测与市场预期相差甚远
item.description:
DHL Group's 2024 forecast falls short of market view on tepid global trade https://t.co/DSZyhcZQus pic.twitter.com/VF4RsEZ28p

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 观看：塔吉特（Target）发布假日季度财报，销售额降幅小于预期，盈利增加，股价上涨 12%。
item.description:
WATCH: Target said that it would open more than 300 predominantly full-size stores over the next decade after it reported higher holiday-quarter earnings on a smaller-than-expected sales decline, sending its shares up 12% https://t.co/fDUVVrjPMU pic.twitter.com/Xd5nEofouN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 新加坡星展银行首席执行官古普塔 2023 年薪酬总额下降 27% 至 830 万美元
item.description:
Singaporean bank DBS CEO Gupta's total pay dropped 27% to $8.3 mln in 2023 https://t.co/Xoy4VSB5LZ pic.twitter.com/SsT9qpgiGn

item.title: 根据伍德麦肯兹和太阳能产业协会发布的一份报告，美国太阳能产业在去年占电网新增发电量的 50% 以上，预计将在 2024 年继续保持增长势头。
item.description:
The US solar industry is expected to continue its momentum in 2024 after accounting for over 50% of new electricity capacity additions to the grid last year, according to a report published by Wood Mackenzie and the Solar Energy Industries Association https://t.co/FzIL3fDQMX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024
